variables.name: LINE_GROUPS
variables.comment: * Emit a new line every this many output tuples. Corresponds to * a 76-character line length (the maximum allowable according to * RFC 2045).

variables.name: ENCODE
variables.comment:
* Lookup table for turning Base64 alphabet positions (6 bits)
         * into output bytes.

variables.name: ENCODE_WEBSAFE
variables.comment:
* Lookup table for turning Base64 alphabet positions (6 bits)
         * into output bytes.

methods.name: public int maxOutputSize(int len)
methods.comment:
* @return an overestimate for the number of bytes {@code
         * len} bytes could encode to.

methods.name: public boolean process(byte[] input, int offset, int len, boolean finish)
